text: Hi <@U05KNCMAE7N> I'm doing initial investigation to integrate HubSpot with Issuu.
It’s not much but we move for now…

A request for people in this conversation or anyone else interested in maps in general: would you be able to post your use cases on the ideas forum or upvote an existing idea with your use case in comment? I searched Ideas forum for maps and found a few <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/forums/searchpage/tab/message/page/1?advanced=false&allow_punctuation=false&collapse_discussion=true&filter=location&location=idea-board:HubSpot_Ideas&q=map&search_type=thread|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/forums/searchpage/tab/message/page/1?advanced=false&al[…]location=idea-board:HubSpot_Ideas&q=map&search_type=thread>

I would love to get to the bottom of what are the different problems you are trying to solve with maps integrations.
<@U03BVLC2LDN> what subcomponents are you using inside the table cell? Does using a combination of Flex & Box work for you? We have a couple of sample projects that show how to use them.

Hello Ian, what are you trying to solve with this function? are you building a UI extension or something else?

I see you are using endpoint function, and hence I am trying to understand your use case more.
